obj_town_burgerpants_slash_Step_0_gml_43: \E1* Ahh^1, Little Buddy^1! Bet you're wondering about that date!/%
obj_town_burgerpants_slash_Step_0_gml_60: \EB* How could I be so naive^1, little buddy?/
obj_town_burgerpants_slash_Step_0_gml_61: \EB* A hot pizza babe like her^1, falling for me? What a joke./
obj_town_burgerpants_slash_Step_0_gml_62: \E7* It's just that..^1. her texts seemed so..^1. real!/
obj_town_burgerpants_slash_Step_0_gml_63: \E8* And the way she talked? It..^1. was honestly really cute!/
obj_town_burgerpants_slash_Step_0_gml_64: \E1* And today? It suddenly got even cuter somehow!!/
obj_town_burgerpants_slash_Step_0_gml_65: \E9* ..^1. haha. I'll always just be a joke^1, won't I^1, Little Buddy?/
obj_town_burgerpants_slash_Step_0_gml_66: \EB* People even call me "Pizzapants^1," instead of my real name.../%
obj_town_burgerpants_slash_Step_0_gml_89: \E7* "Sorry I couldn't find you^1! I left a bag of..."/
obj_town_burgerpants_slash_Step_0_gml_90: \EA* "..^1. homemade cookies near the pizza place!"/%
obj_town_burgerpants_slash_Step_0_gml_13: \EE* IT'S REAL!!^1! COOKIES!!^1! AND THEY LOOK LIKE ME!!!/
\ED* Little Buddy!!^1! You know what this means!? She's REAL!!!/%
obj_town_burgerpants_slash_Step_0_gml_14: \E7* Wait a second^1! There's a message in the cookie bag!/
\ED* SHE WANTS TO MEET ME AT THE FESTIVAL TOMORROW!?/
\EC* Hot damn!!^1! Little Buddy!!^1! I DID IT!!!!/
obj_town_burgerpants_slash_Step_0_gml_25: * Oh^1, a customer^1! Sorry^1, would love to make you some ice cream^1, but we're closed!/
